column4: In the Ubuntu Fridge events, what time zones are the events mentioned in? For example it says on March 30th there is a Edubuntu meeting from 16:00 to 18:00.. in what time zone?
UTC/Zulu, probably
try System->Preferences->Mouse?
it's gnome-mouse-properties. Thanks for that help a lot.
because ext3 doesn't need defraging like MS formats do
AFAIK, yes
and pmafia: ok that's good to hear. Now how do I boot Ubuntu LiveCD into command line only mode?
yes
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LiveCDPersistence
too late, you just did ;)
some of us have our IRC clients set up to beep on [bang] ops
do you know of any other tool that is as sweet as wget? I have wget running on my Cygwin as well :)
is that the same Christian Ubuntu project that had it's IRC channel here on Freenode shut down because the ops were being abusive?

I see.. ok ..
try "top" - but don't worry too much, memory is there to be used, after all
